content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm looking to rent it out for the highest possible price. Let's start negotiating the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
